lindo game, perfecto para estar tranquilo y disfrutar de la vida (?

Honestly,,, the game is worth the money. Especially with how often it goes on sale. With this many hours in the game, it would be hard to say I didn't enjoy it. For all it's bugs, for all the unbalanced mechanics, for all of the never ending changes to things that didn't need changes; I think that's what keeps it fresh and interesting for me. It's not perfect, and at times it makes me lash out at my friends. However, with such strong emotion, it only shows me how invested into the game I actually am. Not to mention I found some really great internet pals thanks to this game. 

It needs work for sure, but I like being along for the ride.

Imagine a game where everyone thinks that they are absolute gods and if they win you are the scum of the planet and should off yourself, and if they lose they think you are cheating or blame their team, and call you some 30 year old who lives in their parents basement. (im not joking, check my comments)
would recommend, very funny people
Every time I get face camped it makes me want to commit war crimes. That said Its a fun game with friends.

Неплохая игра, когда играешь один сразу надоедает, так что лучше собрать людей в тиму.
Повеселиться хороша, но сколько же в дбд дизбаланса и говн... Лучше не пробовать если ваша попа легко воспламеняется.

Alright so since I only played Killer so far ( Don`t have anyone to survive with ) I`m not a complete expert on this so take this with some skepticism.

First the Negative:
The game encourages unfun behavior wich sucks for Killers and Survivors via the point system.
Excample: The Killer has a good run downs the survivors in one clean sweep and starts Hooking them, well since you only had 4 Chases and 4 Downs, EVEN THOUGH EVERYONE IS DEAD, you suck and will loose ranking as well as not get that many points.

Problems within the game are not fixed through balancing but instead through bandaids wich kinda help but also not.
Generators are done way too quick 1 Survivor can just loop you for 2 minutes if they are good and meanwhile 3 Generators can go off, instead of making adjustements to this they add Ruin wich is complete cancer for survivors and slows down the game, kinda nice but now it`s almost required to beat good survivors.

Survive with friends makes some perks useless like knockout wich hides downed survivors aura within a certain radius but people on com can just tell you where they are, against randoms really usefull otherwise might not even exist.

Some Survivors can be really unfun to play against when they keep teabagging at the exit or otherwise just BM you and the Devs won`t do anything against Toxicity ingame wich is kinda sad.



The Good.

The game is really fun when you don`t run into the bad apples  within the community.

Most killers are well designed and fun to play though some balancing issues remain.

The perksystem though not ideal and not perfectly balanced has a lot of variety and can be used to make very fun and creative builds.

Through leveling up you receive some pesudo premium currency wich you can use to get dlc killers for free, not the licensed ones (wich is understandable) but a free killer or cosmetic is still free.

If you play with likeminded people and don`t fall into toxicity yourself you will find a lot of people who play for the fun of it as well and reward your positivity in the same manner.

That all beeing said I wouldn`t recommend this game at full price, wait for a sale, buy The game and Leatherface and unlock his perk BBQ and Chilli (it makes the exp grind easier as well as finding the survivors its really good) and just play whatever you want from there.

Este juego es simplemente genial, competitivo y con una gran variedad de juego entre partida y partida, ya sea que juegues como Asesino o superviviente.



Pasan los años y el juego se pone cada día mejor!
nada viciante, jogador de leatherface nem é gente, comprei ele e dlc e n me arrependo
very fun to play with friends
非常好玩的一款休闲游戏，平时去玉米地偷偷玉米，牛树下烤烤烧烤，时不时还有年迈的农场主想跟你玩玩幼稚的躲猫猫，真好不说了我被热情的农场主抱起来举高高了。

Used to have a review back in 2018 that said the game was fun and back then it was
but being a part of the game community since beta in 2016 its sad to see the state of the game now 
the game is fun yes 
for the first 1000 hours or so its a blast its like a honeymoon one of the best games ever
but once you start playing more and more you realize how much the developers keep screwing up 
mistake after mistake
 
Dedicated servers and Crossplay in my mind is what ruined the game 
Console survivors and killers are just some of the worst players to play with and are extremely laggy
people who VPN from countries like China and Russia make the game infinitely worse 
The Meta has been stale for almost 3 years with survivors and killers running mostly the same perks 
You have over a hundred perks in the game and at most 15 actually see play because tbh a lot of the perks are downright garbage
 
Poor map design/indoor maps make the game super unfun hawkins (which is being removed btw XD) The Game Lampkin lane Swamp RPD Lerys Dead dog Saloon Midwich Yamoka and MOST variations of Badham are fucking awful with unfair tiles dead zones and with the new aspect of random breakable doors makes it a tossup on whether or not you have a busted ass loop or a super oppressive dead end 
The meta at higher "ranks" (which shouldn't even exist because its not a competitive game) is to run oppressive slowdowns and promote a very toxic playstyle on killer side because again out of the hundred or so perks only like a handful actually are worth using and on the survivor side the same applies 

the game CAN be fun it really can be but the developers seem to be more focused on pumping out content for more money and adding updates for no reason like the graphical update and character model update than they are working on what they have in the game to increase perk viability map balancing and longevity 
They can add as much shit as they want but this game is just a pig with makeup smeared on it 
it looks cute but at the end of a day its literally just a pig covered in makeup

Do better BHVR
good game don't get it, wait till they ffix the entire game thank you
The game did not suit me

You like Matchmaking yourself with Rank 10 - 6 Killers that have over 2,000+ Hours clocked into the game plus full Perks that allow them to see through walls at your Rank 16 Survivor with only 20 Hours in, barely any good Perks or anything, giving you absolutely no chance to win cause the Matchmaking system is absolute garbage?
Oh, you might think to yourself, "BUT STUDGRANDPA! JUST PLAY KILLER THEN!"
Good suggestion bucko! I totally love being bullied constantly by Flashlight using Survive With Friend Rank 7 Pre-Mades at my Rank 18 Killer!
Over-all, solid 5/7. Would let a salty, one shotting Michael Myers face camp me again.

Dead by Daylight одинаково хорошо заставляет игрока чувствовать себя и испуганной жертвой, и хладнокровным охотником. Хотя правильнее будет сказать — «заставляла». Когда только вышла и первые, совсем еще неопытные, убийцы и жертвы зашли в игру. А так после 20-30 часов уже особо то и не страшно )
Я знаю, что вы сделали прошлым летом
Задачи у сторон простые. Четверка выживших должна избежать жарких объятий маньяка, запустить пять генераторов и поскорее смыться через один из открывшихся выходов. Маньяку же надо выследить бедолаг и аккуратно развесить по крюкам.
